## StabilityDepositChange type

Represents the change between two Stability Deposit states.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type StabilityDepositChange<T> = {
    depositKUSD: T;
    withdrawKUSD?: undefined;
} | {
    depositKUSD?: undefined;
    withdrawKUSD: T;
    withdrawAllKUSD: boolean;
};
```
